name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D LIVE!!!】3D新衣装お披露目!! ゲストと歌って踊って生誕祭♪♪♪【hololive⧸宝鐘マリン】 [wF_VmniNI2I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Marine and Suisei discuss their duet performance.
Performance of the song 'Wonderful Rush' with guests.

subtitles.original: Sparking Now! 強くタフなハート
subtitles.english: Sparking Now! A strong and tough heart

subtitles.original: 磨いたら世界は見違える
subtitles.english: Once polished, the world will look completely different

subtitles.original: Sparking Now! 高くかざしたソウル
subtitles.english: Sparking Now! A soul held high

subtitles.original: 力の限り 目指せ1000%
subtitles.english: With all your might, aim for 1000%

subtitles.original: もっとずっと遠い場所だと思っていた。手の届かない夢物語。
subtitles.english: I thought it was a much more distant place. An unreachable fairy tale.

subtitles.original: 待て！ねえ待て、父さんでしょ！
subtitles.english: Wait! Wait, you're my father, aren't you?!

subtitles.original: どんな小さな光も見逃さずにいた。少しでもあなたに近づくために。
subtitles.english: I never let even the smallest light escape my sight. All to get even a little closer to you.

subtitles.original: この命、たとえ失ってもお守りいたします。
subtitles.english: Even if I were to lose this life, I shall protect you.

subtitles.original: 闇を切り裂く胸の奥の勇気、迷いを断ち切り白い翼。
subtitles.english: The courage deep within my chest that slices through the darkness, white wings that cut through hesitation.

subtitles.original: もう一人で何でもできるって思うんじゃないわよ！
subtitles.english: Don't think you can do everything on your own anymore!

subtitles.original: 立ち止まりそうになっても、今ここにある笑顔、胸に閉じ込めて。
subtitles.english: Even if I'm about to stop, I'll keep the smile that's here now locked in my heart.

subtitles.original: 守られてるばっかりは嫌やわ。うちも守りたい！
subtitles.english: I'm tired of always being protected. I want to protect too!

subtitles.original: Burning Heart! 熱く燃やすよ今。
subtitles.english: Burning Heart! I'll burn it hot now.

subtitles.original: 手探りの世界を突き抜けて。
subtitles.english: Breaking through this fumbling world.

subtitles.original: Burning Heart! 闇を照らしたのは、
subtitles.english: Burning Heart! What lit up the darkness was,

subtitles.original: 自分自身の光る 1000%
subtitles.english: My own shining 1000%.

subtitles.original: Sparking Now! 強くタフなハート
subtitles.english: Sparking Now! A strong and tough heart

subtitles.original: 磨いたら世界は見違える
subtitles.english: Once polished, the world will look completely different

subtitles.original: Sparking Now! 高くかざしたソウル
subtitles.english: Sparking Now! A soul held high

subtitles.original: 力の限り 目指せ 1000%
subtitles.english: With all your might, aim for 1000%

subtitles.original: Burning Heart! 熱く燃やすよ今。
subtitles.english: Burning Heart! I'll burn it hot now.

subtitles.original: 手探りの世界を突き抜けて。
subtitles.english: Breaking through this fumbling world.

subtitles.original: Burning Heart! 闇を照らしたのは、
subtitles.english: Burning Heart! What lit up the darkness was,

subtitles.original: 自分自身の光る 1000%
subtitles.english: My own shining 1000%.

subtitles.original: あ～！すいちゃ～い！
subtitles.english: Ah~! Suichan~!

subtitles.original: すいちゃんと初めて一緒に歌った～！
subtitles.english: I sang together with Suichan for the first time~!

subtitles.original: 嘘だよ！
subtitles.english: No way!

subtitles.original: いや、今まではね、こう混ざり合っての一緒はあったけど、
subtitles.english: Well, up until now, we've sung together in groups,

subtitles.original: 二人きりでは初めてで。
subtitles.english: but this is the first time just the two of us.

subtitles.original: 初めて。
subtitles.english: First time.

subtitles.original: え、どう？なんか結構バランスいいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: So, how was it? Don't you think the balance was pretty good?

subtitles.original: このさ、あ、何？何？
subtitles.english: This, like... Oh, what? What?

subtitles.original: なんかバランス、色のバランスの話ね。
subtitles.english: Like the balance, talking about the color balance.

subtitles.original: 何が言いたかったかな～？
subtitles.english: What was I trying to say~?

subtitles.original: え、なんかほら、赤と青でほら、なんかいい感じ...
subtitles.english: Like, look, red and blue, it feels like a nice...

subtitles.original: なんかちんちくりんだな。
subtitles.english: It's kind of puny.

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: Hold on a second.

subtitles.original: なんかすいちゃんの隣に立つとなんか、え、マリン、なんか、
subtitles.english: Whenever I stand next to Suichan, Marine, like...

subtitles.original: なんだろう、あの、ピクミンみたいだよね。
subtitles.english: how do I put it, I look like a Pikmin, right?

subtitles.original: 赤ピクミン？
subtitles.english: Red Pikmin?

subtitles.original: え、キャプテン・オリマーの方？赤ピクミンの方？
subtitles.english: Wait, the Captain Olimar one? Or the Red Pikmin one?

subtitles.original: 赤ピクミンの方。あ、キャプテン・オリマーじゃない？
subtitles.english: The Red Pikmin one. Wait, not Captain Olimar?

subtitles.original: 赤ピクミンの方。
subtitles.english: The Red Pikmin one.

subtitles.original: キャプテン・オリマーじゃない。
subtitles.english: Not Captain Olimar.

subtitles.original: いや、すいちゃん...
subtitles.english: Come on, Suichan...

subtitles.original: やめ、そんな話して尺使わないで。
subtitles.english: Stop, don't use up the time talking about that.

subtitles.original: はい、はい、はい。
subtitles.english: Okay, okay, okay.

subtitles.original: 赤ピクミンしかない。はい。
subtitles.english: Nothing but Red Pikmin. Okay.

subtitles.original: 今日はすいちゃんが選んでくれたこの曲、1000%SPARKING!。
subtitles.english: Today, we sang this song Suichan chose, "1000%SPARKING!".

subtitles.original: 懐かしのアニソン。ネギまの曲なんだよ。知ってた？
subtitles.english: An old anime song. It's from Negima. Did you know?

subtitles.original: もちろん知ってるよ。
subtitles.english: Of course I know.

subtitles.original: そうだよね。一緒に歌えて本当に嬉しかった。ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Right. I was really happy we could sing it together. Thank you.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: なんかすごかったよね、ネギまあれ。
subtitles.english: That Negima arrangement was amazing, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: 本当に。めっちゃ高かったし。
subtitles.english: Truly. It was super high-pitched too.

subtitles.original: すいちゃん、踊りも本当にお疲れ様。
subtitles.english: Suichan, thanks for the hard work on the dancing too.

subtitles.original: お疲れ様！
subtitles.english: Good work!

subtitles.original: Dan dan 心 Dan dan 熱く
subtitles.english: Dan dan heart, dan dan hot

subtitles.original: 夢いっぱい叶えてみせる
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can grant all my dreams

subtitles.original: Dan dan 進む Dan dan 弾ける
subtitles.english: Dan dan moving forward, dan dan popping

subtitles.original: 未来をしっかり見て
subtitles.english: Look firmly at the future

subtitles.original: (ハイハイ進めまだまだいこう)
subtitles.english: (Hi hi, move forward, keep going)

subtitles.original: (ハイハイ進めほらほらレッツゴー)
subtitles.english: (Hi hi, move forward, look look let's go)

subtitles.original: 大事なことは何だっけ？
subtitles.english: What was the important thing again?

subtitles.original: (何だっけ？)
subtitles.english: (What was it?)

subtitles.original: 小さな努力が...
subtitles.english: A small effort...
